name: Spoolman
short_desc: Self-hosted 3D printer filament spool inventory management
author: Donkie
description: Spoolman is a self-hosted web service for managing 3D printer filament spool inventory. It automatically tracks spool weights as printing progresses and integrates with OctoPrint, Klipper/Moonraker, and Home Assistant.

form_fields.label: User ID (PUID)
form_fields.hint: User ID for file permissions in the container

form_fields.label: Group ID (PGID)
form_fields.hint: Group ID for file permissions in the container

form_fields.label: Logging Level
form_fields.hint: Logging level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL

form_fields.label: Automatic Backup
form_fields.hint: Enable automatic nightly backup for SQLite database (TRUE/FALSE)
